data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick Shonan.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Shonan's Hiroto Nakagawa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ryo Nagai (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan's Temma Matsuda gets in a shot on goal at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 8, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Takuya Okamoto heads in to make it 1-0 at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Great play from Kazunari Ono to set up the goal.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Hiroshima at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
In Kanagawa Hiroshima attack through Gakuto Notsuda. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 15, Yusuke Araki awards Shonan a goal kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Hiroshima push upfield but Yusuke Araki quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Hiroshima at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Shonan are pushing forward but Mitsuki Saito's finish is wide of the goal.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Shonan in the half of Hiroshima.
Yusuke Araki signals a Shonan throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Hiroshima.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Hiroshima's Ryo Nagai goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
In the minute 28, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shonan.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Kohei Shimizu of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 35, Shonan are coming forward and Temma Matsuda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Throw-in Shonan.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
In the minute 39, In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 41, Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Hiroshima's area.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ezequiel for Hiroshima who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Tsukasa Morishima (Hiroshima) has replaced the possibly injured Ezequiel.
In the minute 43, Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shonan pushes forward through Akimi Barada, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 44, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yusuke Araki will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Yusuke Araki signals a Shonan throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Free kick Hiroshima.
The first-half has come to a close in Kanagawa.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yoshifumi Kashiwa is on a sub for Kodai Dohi for Hiroshima.
Yuya Asano is replacing Ryo Nagai for Hiroshima at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Shonan.
Shonan's Taiga Hata gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 52, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Kanagawa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Shonan needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Shonan.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Hiroshima.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a fourth substitution, with Hayao Kawabe replacing Gakuto Notsuda.
Shonan make their first substitution with Shota Kobayashi replacing Mitsuki Saito.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 66, Goal! Hayao Kawabe levels the match at 1-1.
Douglas Vieira instrumental with a fine assist.
Yusuke Araki awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yuki Ohashi is replacing Hiroto Nakagawa for the home team.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 73, Free kick Hiroshima.
Koki Tachi for Shonan has been booked by Yusuke Araki and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
The away team have replaced Kohei Shimizu with Shunki Higashi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Hiroshi Jofuku.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Shonan push forward at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka and Shota Kobayashi gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Hiroshima defence.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 81, Hiroshima's Yuya Asano breaks free at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 83, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Bin Ukishima is making the team's third substitution at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka with Hiroshi Ibusuki replacing Temma Matsuda.
The home team have replaced Akimi Barada with Kazuki Oiwa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
Throw-in Shonan.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 86, Douglas Vieira (Hiroshima) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Hayao Kawabe for Hiroshima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 87, Shonan have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Hiroshi Ibusuki for Shonan drives towards goal at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Yusuke Araki awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Kanagawa.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan's Shota Kobayashi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Hiroshima's Douglas Vieira misses with an attempt on goal.
Shonan have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
